metadata.title: keycloak: org.keycloak.protocol.oidc: unvalidated cross-origin messages in checkLoginIframe leads to DDoS (important)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Keycloak's OIDC component in the "checkLoginIframe," which allows unvalidated cross-origin messages. This flaw allows attackers to coordinate and send millions of requests in seconds using simple code, significantly impacting the application's availability without proper origin validation for incoming messages.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 is installed
rh-sso7-keycloak-server is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
